tool_description: Workable, recruit people by creating beautiful job posts through an API
name: Workable
title: Workable

api_list.name: /candidates

parameters.name: candidate
parameters.description: Look at the example on the right hand side for all parameters

parameters.name: shortcode
parameters.description: The shortcode is a unique identifier for each jobs and can be seen by invoking  "/jobs"

utterances.utterance: Can you add John Doe as a candidate for the Software Engineer position?
Please create a candidate profile for Jane Smith for the Data Analyst role.
I need to register Michael Johnson as a candidate for the Marketing Manager job.
Add Emily Davis to the list of candidates for the Product Designer position.
Could you include Robert Brown as a candidate for the Financial Analyst role?
Please set up a candidate entry for Laura Wilson for the HR Specialist job.
I’d like to add David Martinez as a candidate for the Sales Executive position.
Can you create a candidate profile for Sarah Anderson for the Customer Support role?
Please register James Taylor as a candidate for the IT Administrator job.
Add Olivia Thomas to the candidate list for the Content Writer position.
